email_body: seems crazy. if you're willing to ride it for a few cents against you it's a great trade. who knows where they're going in th eshort term though slafontaine@globalp.com on 12/01/2000 09:57:30 AM To: John.Arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: re:summer inverses johnnny-you think these inverses ready to get sold yet? to me its all a timing issue but aug/oct at 4-5 cts seems rich rich for injection season. only issue is when to go?
